Key Match Events: Jofra Archer took three wickets for 23 runs
Dawid Malan hit the winning blow
Post-Match Reflections: England exacted a first dose of revenge for the Test series defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of a bumper crowd of 67,200
Others: England restricted India to 124 for seven
Jonny Bairstow finished the match with 26 not out
